product_context.title: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: These companion dimmers do not work without having at least 1 incandescent bulb in the circuit. You will not be able to turn the lights off from the companion switch if all the bulbs are LEDS. After changing 3 of these I finally figured it out. I decided to put all LED bulbs, but removed one and put a regular bulb and it now works, so I dont have to buy new switches again. Junk dont buy these!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2024
reviews.title: Need at least one non LED bulb or you wont be able to turn off from the companion switch!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: This is a great product for 3 way applications, perfect companion to a Lutron dimmer switch. This switch is a companion only, you must have a master switch that’s compatible.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: This didn’t work during my first several times trying to install. I watched all the videos and read the paper instructions carefully. It’s missing the following which you might need. Attached missing instructions for your benefit. Note: you’ll need the proper master maestro dimmer to use with this

reviews.title: Great product but missing troubleshooting instructions

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: I had a 4 way switch (3 switches for the same set of lights). Worked with the Maestro dimmer switch. You’ll need these if you have more than 2 switches.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2024
reviews.title: Works great

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: I have this installed along with 2 other Lutron Switches in my Kitchen as my Kitchen uses a Triple-Switch setup. Most dimmers cannot use more than 2 switches; this one has a little "network" where it actually remembers where you have set your dimmer and each switch has its own dimmer buttons. Truly a great product that is basically a one of a kind. I am really happy with my setup. If the switches fail I will report back but otherwise count me as a happy customer!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2024
reviews.title: The only real Multi-Pole Dimmer solution for more than 2 Switches

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: This is a remote control for a Maestro dimmer. Will not work in any other installation
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.title: Make sure you know what you're buying

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: The instructions to pair are wrong as written in packaging. I had a Lutron to Lutron switch and the instructions said you DO NOT need to pair, but you do. Press and hold to access the blinking lights, press off, then press and hold until the light turns from blinking to steady, then release. Since the instructions were not correct, I assumed the first light was defective and it was not.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.title: Instructions not correct

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: I installed these Lutron dimmers in multiple rooms. They are a top quality dimmer. I had to replace my old cheaper dimmers. I love the “slow dim to turn off” function. Only wish there were directions readily available. I had to Google search to figure out how to program and find out functions
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.title: Top quality- should get 5 stars if there were directions for programming

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: Very easy to install and adds great functionality; this allows a 3-way light to be dimmed from both switch locations. Note that this is designed to be a companion unit to the Maestro main dimmer switch, so you'll need to install that at one switch location and this at the other.

reviews.title: Excellent way to add that extra dimmer location

It seems to be the trend to pack items poorly and shippers damage product consistently, they only want to get the product to you to get paid no matter how it arrives.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: These are for rich people, normal folks should not purchase. You cannot pair the Maestro with a normal 3-way switch, accepting the simplistic reality of only dimming on one side... you must use these in combination with the "Companion" switch if you want to use in a 3-way configuration. Just WAY too expensive.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.title: Too expensive, not versatile.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: Not much to say. This is a companion or accessory dimmer that is used in conjunction with a Maestro digital fade, multi-location dimmer. Straightforward instructions, excellent quality (typical for Lutron controls) and easy to install. Works like a champ too! No muss, no fuss, no hassle, no schmassle.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2022
reviews.title: Typical Lutron-it works and works well!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: These can dim some of my LED recessed lights below the brightness of nearby nightlights, without flickering, in both 3 & 4-way configurations.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.title: unmatched dimming range & lighting stability

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: I have to replace 2 in the dining room now. Had to replace the 3 in my kitchen 5 years ago. I better be real nice to the one in my bed room. It's the fragile, precision mechanical stuff in the cover that breaks. Be real nice to em or they'll bust on ya fer spite. I nevah nevah hada to replace a toggle 2-3-4 way switch in over 50 years. Luty up yos. Gonna git me some from a lucky brand. Cross yer fingers for me.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
reviews.title: Cute Cool Wow Them's the ones. that is what I thought years ago. D'm they are fragile! I AM DONE!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: I've done a lot of switch replacements. We have a 4 way switch with an old dimmer in the hall that wouldn't work with new LED's so I tried these. The install was super simple with their website videos, but I do wish they mentioned you don't need to use the common (like in their marketing) during the install video. Anyhow everything works great on all 3 switches (the 2 companions and the main Maestro).
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.title: Perfect

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: I installed several of these and the companion dimmers. They were easy to install in both 3 way and 4 way configurations. The 4 way didn't work correctly when I got done. I called tech support and within 2 minutes got them working correctly. Very helpful. These are electronic switches and much simpler to hook up correctly than the old manual 4 way switches. That said, they're fairly delicate. If you've got kids banging the switches, you may end up replacing them more often than you'd like.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022
reviews.title: Great Tech Support

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: Works as expected. Quality appears good. A little pricey.

reviews.title: Works as expected.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: Love these switches. I have switches for one light in an entry way. I bought a master switch from lowes and decided to order the two companion switches because they weren't available at lowes. When I went to install them my wireing didnt match what was in the instructions and the more i tried to figure out the wireing the more confused i got so i hired an electrician to complete the job.(good idea). Yeah it cost me more but they work great and I'm very pleased with them.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.title: Great switches.

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: Do not buy!!!! These are old stock refurbished switches. 50/50 if they work. I spent 3 hours troubleshooting a 3 pole connection to find out this switch was the problem. DO NOT BUY!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2022
reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: **must be used in tandem with a Lutron Maestro dimmer. One Maestro dimmer matched with up to 8 Maestro "companion" dimmers on one circuit.** This is a must have if you are using a Maestro dimmer on a multi switch location setup. It is much easier to wire in than rewiring a mechanical on/off switch to operate properly on the same circuit. It also has the same features (on/off/max brightness/last used brightness/countdown to off) as the Maestro dimmer. The only feature missing are the LEDs that indicate the brightness level on the switch. I would definitely use again!!!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2022
reviews.title: **must be used in tandem with a Lutron Maestro dimmer**

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: I used these to replace similar switches in our house that failed all at the same time. Very high quality and high technology. Only thing was I didn’t realize I had to use a base with a master dimmer, could not run two dimmer switches like top and bottom of staircase like other brand, found out when I went to install. Quality, price and quick delivery from Amazon make these a real find!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
reviews.title: High quality switches technology driven

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: We had a delayed install, and once we did, we found the switch inoperable. The light would come on, but the switch would not turn it off. Now we are stuck with an inoperable switch and no ability to return.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2022
reviews.title: Switch does not work

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: I had smart touch switch’s in my house already which we’re purchased long ago. This is a companion to the master. So I wasn’t sure if would still be compatible with my old master switch. But it worked fine. It’s a good long lasting product
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2022
reviews.title: Works well

reviews.title: You Need the Master to Make Them Work

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: I purchased one of these here on Amazon in late 2021, then tried one at Home Depot, and they both have the same issue. The button is extremely shallow, it feels like you have to push super hard to get a click, and especially so on the companion switch when you compare it to the button on the main dimmers.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2022
reviews.title: Problem with Button Being Shallow in 2021

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: I’ve installed probably hundreds of switches of all different types and any Lurton Maestro switch is the best switch. I was trying to save a few bucks and went with a different manufacturer first and then a different Lurton switch and nothing worked for the set up / wiring of a townhome we bought. Decided to go back to Maestro and it worked the first time. Don’t waste you time with the knock offs or the frustration to get it to work just go with this switch. Shipping was fast and these are being used in 3-way and 4-way applications with the same ease.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2021
reviews.title: Nothing compares to a Maestro switch!

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: Excellent! Mates with master to combine dim 10 positions and 140W of dimmable LED's in the kitchen.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2021
reviews.title: Slaved switch to master - as advertised

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: this is really a disgrace for some one to put on the market a product that does not work. This should not be allowed to fly, been an electrician for 35 years cannot coplain about my installation process. It has a shorted chip in side and stays on all the time. If you have a little of dignity and respect return my money
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2021
reviews.title: it does not work

reviews.productTitle: Lutron Maestro Companion Multi-Location Dimmer Not for Standalone Use MA-R-WH, White
reviews.text: I purchased not 1 but 2. Tried them both in a single pole application. Neither worked! Ok your thinking you must have installed it incorrectly. I used to be an electrician in the Navy, I've installed unknown numbers of outlets and switches. Checked for any irregular requirements for installation on Lutron website, google and utube. Nothing unusual, typical installation, neither worked. Spent way to much time on this, very frustrating!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2021
reviews.title: strike 2 your out

reviews.text: Nice plastic. Click is the most satisfying click in the game...feels natural and kind on fingers to use. Instal can be finicky on the first go, install 5 and you’re good for 50.
